title: Beyond Broken
description: Formed by tragedy, Caleb Montgomery pushes away anyone who could care for him, as beautiful as he is devasting. Once upon a time, Maddie Ashby thought that he was the man of her dreams. But the boy with obsidian eyes that sheâ€™d once adored is long gone, replaced by a man whose broken past has molded and shaped him into someone unrecognizably cruel and hardened.One mistake brings them together. Another will change both of their lives forever.
author: E. Winters
